ComicInfo.Summary:
Allies and Enemies
The mayhem in Munchkinland continues! Mary is caught up in a battle between her new friends the Freedom Fighters and the evil Ladies Auxiliary Brigade led by the Nome King's henchwoman, Witch Mombi. At the same time, Kevin, Peter, Max and the newly dis-enchanted Scarecrow meet up with the second Evil King, the Tin Woodsman. And does he have an axe to grind!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-24 20:57:08. [Issue ID 40139]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/oz-4-allies-and-enemies/4000-40139/
